title: Update contact information with phone and email

requirements.summary: Update the phone number in CTAButtons component to 8136009930 for the Call Now button
acceptanceCriteria: Call Now button in CTAButtons component uses tel:+918136009930
Phone link works correctly on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Update the Call Now button href to use tel:+918136009930. Maintain the existing button styling and structure while updating only the phone number in the tel: link.

requirements.summary: Update the WhatsApp number in CTAButtons component to 8136009930
acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp button uses the number 918136009930 in the wa.me URL
Pre-filled WhatsApp messages open correctly with the new number

file_operations.description: Update the WhatsApp button to use wa.me/918136009930 in the href. Preserve the existing optional pre-filled service and location message parameters while updating only the phone number portion of the URL.

requirements.summary: Update the phone number in Footer component to display 8136009930
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays +91 8136009930 as the contact phone number
Phone number is clickable and opens phone dialer on mobile

file_operations.description: Update the phone number in the contact details section to display +91 8136009930. Ensure the phone number is wrapped in a clickable link using tel:+918136009930 format. Maintain consistent formatting with the +91 prefix for display.

requirements.summary: Update the email address in Footer component to ajayyadavddm@gmail.com
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays ajayyadavddm@gmail.com as the contact email
Email is clickable and opens default email client with correct recipient

file_operations.description: Update the email address in the contact details section to ajayyadavddm@gmail.com. Ensure the email is wrapped in a mailto: link that opens the default email client with the correct recipient address.

requirements.summary: Update the phone number in ContactPage to display 8136009930 in the contact details section
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page shows +91 8136009930 in contact details
Phone number is properly formatted and clickable

file_operations.description: Update the phone number in the contact details section to display +91 8136009930. Ensure the phone number is wrapped in a clickable tel: link using tel:+918136009930 format. Maintain consistent formatting with the +91 prefix for visual display.

requirements.summary: Update the email address in ContactPage to display ajayyadavddm@gmail.com in the contact details section
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page shows ajayyadavddm@gmail.com in contact details
Email address is clickable and formatted correctly

file_operations.description: Update the email address in the contact details section to ajayyadavddm@gmail.com. Ensure the email is wrapped in a mailto: link that opens the default email client with the correct recipient address.

requirements.summary: Update WhatsApp booking links in ServicesPage to use phone number 8136009930 for all six service categories
acceptanceCriteria: All service category WhatsApp links use 918136009930
Pre-filled service booking messages open correctly with the new number

file_operations.description: Update all WhatsApp booking links across the six service categories (mason, electrician, plumber, painter, construction helper, daily wage labour) to use wa.me/918136009930. Preserve the existing pre-filled message templates for each service type while updating only the phone number portion of the URLs.
